name: Kingdom Friends Go Korea!
description:
Kingdom Friend's Go Korea is a game to help educate people about Korea with the help of Hujong, Mugo and Kawoo.

This game is created for the competition for TKO (Tourism Korea Organisation) to help educate Gen Z and Millennials about Korea.

It is a story of Kingdom Friends going to Korea and showing around the different tourist  locations in Korea as well as the culture.
